articles.author: David Pierce
articles.title: The Opal Tadpole is a high-end webcam designed specifically for laptops - The Verge
articles.description: Opal’s C1 was a desktop webcam meant for serious use. With the Tadpole, it’s trying to appeal to a road warrior wanting to look better on Meet or Zoom or Teams.
articles.content:
Opals second camera is the Tadpole, a tiny webcam for laptops

articles.author: Science X
articles.title: Faster Arctic warming hastens 2-degree-Celsius rise by eight years, finds modeling study - Phys.org
articles.description: Faster warming in the Arctic will be responsible for a global 2 C temperature rise being reached eight years earlier than if the region were warming at the average global rate, according to a new modeling study led by UCL researchers.
